jv_history.source_quote: Cavazos sits down with Jalisa Hardy—a single mom, human design expert, and author—who empowers women to live with ... Leni is the perfect accomplice for this journey! How To Run Profitable Retreats is

what_you_do: Leni is a marketing and business strategist, as well as founder of The Retreat Planner. She helps coaches and entrepreneurs to build six-figure retreat businesses.
who_you_serve: Spiritual entrepreneurs, coaches, and teachers who dream of transforming lives through impactful retreats.
business_focus: Helping coaches and entrepreneurs build six-figure retreat businesses.
